channel.title: CVE Feed for Miek Gieben -- miekg-dns
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Miek Gieben -- miekg-dns

item.title: CVE-2017-15133|2024-08-05T19:50:16.057Z -- miek%20gieben -- miekg-dns
item.description: A denial of service flaw was found in miekg-dns before 1.0.4. A remote attacker could use carefully timed TCP packets to block the DNS server from accepting new connections.
